title: The Vilsolad Mausoleum
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dynamikron]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= Lost in the woods
= You run and run
= A horrific fear
= A loud scream
= You trip and fall
= You slam on the floor
= You expect grass
= But you feel marble
-----
[[image Poster.jpg]]
-----
You have some time. This place seems peculiar. Why not take a look at what this place contains?

[[tabview]]
[[tab SCP ART]]
-----
= A room of paintings
= Both void and full of life
= They twist and turn
= They whisper small hymns
= You stare and they rest
= You remember their names
-----
[[[art:princess-arthur-doodle|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
I drew this in like an hour. I had just finished reading SCP-8307 so I felt like drawing something based off it. I ended up drawing the gal herself MAGICAL GIRL ARTHUR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:fisher-queen-doodle|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
After drawing that SCP-8307 piece I felt like I should draw one for it's sudo-sequel SCP-8191. It ended up looking a lot more like a poster than I thought it would. I think it looks really good. My highest rated artwork btw.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/tab]]
[[tab TALE ART]]
-----
= You enter an observatory
= Empty aside from a desk
= The desk is covered in clipboards and papers
= You pick up a picture frame
= It tells a story
= It tells a memory
-----
[[[art:site-director-heather|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
Forgotten memories is probably my favourite canon so I was inevitably going to draw a piece based off it, eventually. So here's the first one.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:let-there-be-a-doodle|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
I drew the other two stories, so I might as well complete the set. This took a bit because my computer crashed while looking for the references.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:masks-of-doodlelathotep|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
The Public Domain Contest was incredible. Every team did such a good job, but if I had to pick a favourite team... It would be The Magical Girl Arthur team. But if I had to choose a second favourite, it would be the Nyarlathotep team.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/tab]]
[[tab GOI ART]]
-----
= You rummage through the crate
= Between frames and folders
= Between pens and discs
= You find a smaller box
= You open it
= They stare back
-----
[[[art:shark-punching-propaganda|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
I love the SPC. They are probably the funniest Group Of Interest in my opinion. I kinda just had this epiphany and dew this poster.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:nobody-draws-at-dawn|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
This is the only category I could think to put it into. I loved reading the series and thought I'd draw some appreciation art.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/tab]]
[[tab COMICS]]
-----
= You take a book off the shelf
= The words meld and morph
= They change colour and shape
= They merge into images
= They act out a story
= They act out a life
-----
There'll be stuff here. Eventually
-----
[[/tab]]
[[tab MISCELLANEOUS]]
-----
= The dark room is full
= Piles and piles of random junk
= You pull a tome from the ground
= It glows bright green
= You look inside
= You recognise the contents
-----
The hub you are currently on.
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="-Close"]]
Originally I was going to have this page be narrated by a character I made called "Dr Gabriel Ark" (I'll write a tale about him eventually, just gotta do a lot more brainstorming) but then I thought of this kinda poetry idea. And well you can clearly see how that ended up.
UPDATE 17/03/2025: I decided to add a drawn poster to add some flare. The character on it was kinda made up while I drew it. So they have no backstory... yet...
UPDATE 15/04/2025: Added a second poster. The character on it is my interpretation of The Administrator
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:arsene-lupin-vs-the-doodle-foundation|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="- Close"]]
Team "TEAM FORTRESS 2" ([[*user Calibold]], [[*user HarryBlank]] and [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]) made the series "Arsene Lupin vs The SCP Foundation" for Public Domain Con 2025. I loved it so much that when I finished reading it, I drew this poster.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:alex-thorley-is-on-a-poster|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="-  Alex Thorley is not here"]]
You walk through the wind and shut the door behind you.
Looking down, you see yourself.
You do not recognise yourself.
You look hand-drawn.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[art:one-should-take-breaks|]]]
[[collapsible show="+ Artist commentary" hide="Close"]]
I was thinking about the idea I had for a series of articles and thought, "Why not draw the focal point/main character", and here he is.
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/tab]]
[[tab SMALL DOODLES]]
-----
= You enter the office
= It's full of piles upon piles of papers
= You pull some off the top
= Most of the paper is blank
= Aside from some small images
= They glare at you
-----
[[collapsible show="+ Dr Draws" hide="- Close"]]
[[image Dinodraws.jpg]]
I love Fir design. Original character created by: [[*user Dino--draws]]
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[collapsible show="+ Dr Blank" hide="-Close"]]
[[image HARRY.jpg]]
I drew this on the same sheet as the Dr Draws image. You know who this is... it's [[*user HarryBlank]]
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

Was that all? You were quite the curious type. But you know what they say about curiosity...
-----
[[image Poster2.jpg]]
-----

= Upon a collected mirage
= The hallway ends
= Intertwined with the lights
= The exit dings
= You stare in horror
= You breath with haste
= A claw reaches out
= You can't run forever
author: vilsolad
